name: Attack On Titan Revive - Fan Game
name_original: Attack On Titan Revive - Fan Game
description:
This is AOT Revive, a game inspired by the Attack On Titan anime. The game currently has 2 playable maps plus an unlockable debug map with the Dev Badge (Obtainable by playing for at least an hour). Inside the game you can play with the ODM gear to kill Dummy titans, using swords and thunder spears. In the training camp it is possible to compete against your personal best on 6 unique levels and an excellent scenario to make the most of the grappling hooks and the various boosts available.

Below you can see a list of the updates that the game will undergo.

Next Update:

  - Advanced ODM System

  - Advanced Thunder Spears

  - New Practice Levels

  - New Practice Scenarios

  - Advanced Thunder Spears Challenge

  - Advanced ODM System Challenge

  - New Soundtrack: Nightmare by Kohta Yamamoto

  - New Soundtrack: Footsteps Of Doom by Kohta Yamamoto

Future Updates:

  - All Titans

  - New Trost Map

  - Experience Levels

  - New Ancient Castle Map

  - New Reiss Chapel Map

  - New Airship Map

  - Titan Shifting

  - Level Editor

  - Scenario Editor

  - New Soundtracks

  - Haptic Feedback

  - Forest Races
